summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1703 for the improvement of Comstock Street, in the City of Seattle, from First Avenue North to Queen Anne Avenue, by grading and curbing the same, and by the construction of concrete walks and stairways and the necessary drainage; under Ordinance No. 18118, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
